questOwnerReceived: The Quest Owner has also Received
questOwnerReceivedFuture: The Quest Owner Will Also Receive
questSend: Clicking "Invite Party" will send an invitation to your party members. When all members have accepted or denied, the quest begins. See status under Options > Social > Party.
questStart: Once all members have either accepted or rejected, the quest begins. Only those that clicked "accept" will be able to participate in the quest and receive the drops. If members are pending too long (inactive?), you can start without them by clicking "Begin".
bossDmg1: To hurt a boss, complete your Dailies and To-Dos. Higher task damage means higher boss damage (completing reds, Mage spells, Warrior attacks, etc). The boss will deal damage to every quest participant for every Daily you've missed (multiplied by the boss's Strength) in addition to your regular damage, so keep your party healthy by completing your dailies! All damage to and from a boss due to your tasks today will be tallied the first time you use HabitRPG tomorrow.
bossDmg2: Only participants will fight the boss and share in the quest loot.
tavernBossInfo: To hurt a world boss, complete your Dailies and To-Dos. Higher task damage means higher boss damage (completing reds, Mage spells, Warrior attacks, etc). For each Daily you've missed (multiplied by the boss's Strength), the boss's Rage will increase. Once his Rage reaches max, something bad will happen - so complete your dailies! All damage to and from a boss is tallied on cron (your day roll-over).
bossColl1: To collect items, do your positive tasks. Quest items drop just like normal items; however, you won't see the drops until the next day, then everything you've found will be tallied up and contributed to the pile.
bossColl2: Only participants can collect items and share in the quest loot.
noScrolls: You don't have any quest scrolls.
scrollsText1: Quests require parties. If you want to quest solo,
scrollsPre: You need to complete the previous quest to start this one!
mustLvlQuest: You must be level <%= level %> to buy this quest!
sureAbort: Are you sure you want to abort this mission? It will abort it for everyone in your party and all progress will be lost.
doubleSureAbort: Are you double sure? Make sure they won't hate you forever!
questWarning: If new players join the party before the quest starts, they will also receive an invitation. However once the quest has started, no new party members can join the quest.
bossRageDescription: When this bar fills, the boss will unleash a special attack
